metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9438 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: libyara/re.c in the regexp module in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted rule (involving hex strings) that is mishandled in the _yr_re_emit function, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9304.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
